body.name: eufy Security Wi-Fi Video Doorbell, 2K Resolution, Real-Time Response, No Monthly Fees, Secure Local Storage, Free Wireless Chime (Require Existing Doorbell Wire, 16-24 VAC, 30 VA or above) (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 14 mins
features: A Crystal-Clear 2K Image: High Definition 2560 x 1920 resolution, combined with our advanced HDR and Distortion Correction, ensures video is recorded in 2x the quality.
No Hidden Costs: Designed to protect your home as well as your wallet, eufy Security products are one-time purchases that combine security with convenience.
Respond in Real-Time: Speak directly to anyone who approaches your front door via two-way audio. Tell your friends to come round the back or that you have just run out to get some milk.

The Alerts Which Matter: With AI technology and our sophisticated algorithm, the camera intelligently detects body shape and face pattern. Ensuring you are only alerted when a human, and not a stray cat, is at the door.
Free electronic chime included: Supports 8 fun and holiday themed ringtones and adjustable volume level. Note: Existing chimes will not work with eufy Security Video Doorbell.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features Storage You Can Trust AES 256-Bit data encryption ensures your footage is kept private on transmission and storage**. A Clear View HDR imaging ensures high clarity for backlit or low-light scenarios, providing a clear image day and night. See More eufy Security Video Doorbell uses a 4:3 aspect ratio to offer a bigger viewable area from top to bottom. Who’s there? Receive facial snapshot notifications* so that you can quickly check who is at the door.

Key Features Smart Detection Zones Activity Zone allows you to customize the areas in which the camera will detect motion. Set the Activity Zone to suit your home so you only receive the alerts you care about. See the Whole Picture View 3 seconds of footage prior to the initial alert. Gain a clearer picture of what happened and increase the likelihood of criminal identification. Interaction Made Easy Record and set up to 3 instant responses. When you are notified of activity simply select one of you pre-recorded responses to interact and give instructions. “Hey Alexa, show me my front door” Connect your Doorbell to Google Voice Assistant or Amazon Alexa and check in anytime on what's happening outside your home.

eufy Security Video Doorbell From eufy, the home security brand where privacy comes first. • Comprehensive Safety Solutions for Your Home • Created by the same team as Anker—renowned for exceptional quality and innovation Protects You, Your Family, and Your Privacy Every eufy Security product is engineered to ensure your security data is kept private. Have peace of mind that you will have a secure record of everything that happens around your home. See who's there before the ring Get instant alerts* for anyone who approaches, even if they don't press the doorbell. Interact with visitors by talking in real time or via pre-set responses. "Hey Google, show me my front door" Connect your Doorbell to Google Assistant or Alexa and check in anytime on what's happening outside your home. Interaction Made Easy Record and set up to 3 instant responses. When you are notified of activity, simply select one of your pre-recorded responses for a simple way to interact and give instructions. Note： The video doorbell is powered by the original doorbell wires. Users need to modify their original chime per instruction or upgrade the doorbell transformer if the original doesn't deliver sufficient power. Users may need to hire an electrician at their own cost if they are not comfortable with the installation process. Wi-Fi only connects to 2.4GHz networks. Not compatible with eufy homebase. What's included: Video Doorbell 2K (Wired), Mounting Bracket, 15° Wedge, Jumper for Existing Chime, Extension Wires, Screw Packs, Doorbell Detaching Pin, Electronic Doorbell Chime, Doorbell Power Pin *Push notifications with thumbnail previews require thumbnail preview images to be temporarily stored in the cloud. **If you choose to use cloud-based features such as cloud storage or push notifications with thumbnail previews, videos or thumbnail previews will be sent to the cloud as needed to provide your selected features.

Video Doorbell 2K (Wired) Dual Camera (Battery-Powered) Video Doorbell 2K (Battery-Powered) Video Doorbell 1080p (Battery-Powered) Video Doorbell E340 Video Resolution 2K Full HD 2K Full HD and HDR 2K Full HD 1080P 2K Battery Options Hardwired only Battery or Hardwire Battery or Hardwire Battery Battery or Hardwired Motion Detection and Notification ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Real-Time Response ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 2-Way Audio ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Alexa / The Google Assistant ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No Monthly Fee ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Wi-Fi Range Extender via Chime / HomeBase ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Dual Cam ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Install And Monitor!
reviews.reviewText: This doorbell product works well. I bought a refurbished, wired 2K doorbell operated by my 16V, 30A transformer. As described, the doorbell will not ring my two old charms, but I did not have to use the jumper wires. I left the wires alone to operate my old backdoor bell button. Only problem was connecting to Bluetooth to set up the system. It would not connect until I used the setup codes (QR) on the device and not the QR code on the instruction card. The setup code was different. The supplied AC Wi-Fi charm works well. The doorbell camera image quality is excellent. Human detection works well. Mobile app is easy to use and monitors everything as promised. I do recommend this doorbell highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your data, no cloud
reviews.reviewText: I can't say for sure, but I can say every doorbell camera I researched required you to purchase a monthly cloud membership to store your videos OR they held them for 24 hours and dumped them. Eufy allows you store your data on a SD card installed in the 'ringer' which is plugged inside your home. Yeah, maybe a SD card will set you back 30 bucks, but after that, no monthly fees and you have complete access and control of you video data. In a age where more and more personal data is being hacked, why wouldn't you want to have one less thing to worry about? If that doesn't do anything for you, how about the clarity of the videos or live feed, the minimal false alerts or the ability to pan and zoom both live and recorded? I can zoom my video doorbell to see a local radio tower red light blinking on top of the transmission tower, and it's a half mile away! No, I can't tell you the wattage of the buld, but pretty impressive I can see it from a doorbell on my front porch. Security for my family and security for our data, a win win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars better quality than most
reviews.reviewText: Beats Ring with video quality, but AI human detection is still not as advanced as Ring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up and great to use
reviews.reviewText: Coming from a Ring doorbell, I changed to this one to stop the monthly/yearly bills. I do use Eufy for security cameras around the house, so figured I just swap to a doorbell. This thing is simple to set up and works well. It's pretty straightforward to set up. Just make sure you have a transformer that meets the specifications. I got the 16v 30va transformer and had no problems with the doorbell. One nice feature is the zone setting within the app to help with alerts and such.I've had no issues with other Eufy products, so not expecting any issues with this one. I do realize, though, that this probably won't connect with the home base 3. While the other devices on the Eufy app display that they are able to connect with HB3, this doorbell doesn't. I can't say 100% as I don't own one, but that's my guess since it doesn't have an option to add it to HB3 on the app.No issues at this time. Will update if any do come up. Got this renewed, and had an issue with a part, but the seller made it very easy to get that broken part replaced, and everything else was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars POWER ISSUES - DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This deserves ZERO stars across the board for product, design, and support. Bought this as a Xmas gift but didn’t get around to install until summer (past the only 90 day warranty).Out of the box this unit was a hassle:1) requires jumper on your doorbell for power supply which disables your bell- that’s why is comes with remote speaker.2) the serial on the envelope was different than the unit. You have to scan this to install while it’s powered. Not helpful when you have it wired up to connect and then have to peel it off and figure out how to scan it while it dangles from a wire.3) appears to have a hungry appetite for power. I could never get it to chime (a signal for inadequate power supply) or connect to the app during install. After reading all the knowledge base I decided to replace my transformer to ensure adequate power. I replaced with transformer per Eufy spec … still did not work.After hours of testing, finally getting out the multi meter and then contacted customer support who refused to replace the unit. I get it … “90 days of warranty.” That said, I have had excellent experience with Phillips, TP-Link and others who back their products and replace them when they die. This was a total exercise is frustration and waste of hours. I will NEVER by another Eufy product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Video door bell with no monthly fee
reviews.reviewText: Product works as intended. I wish it fully integrated with existing door bell, but works great otherwise. Nice alternative to the other big brand. I like this one because i don't have to pay a monthly fee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work with existing/mechanical chime
reviews.reviewText: Minus 2 for the fine print even in the Amazon listing it does say (I read after the fact) that it WILL BYPASS your doorbell chime. A plug in the wall chime comes with it and isn’t even loud enough to hear in your bedroom on the other side of the door. It is super quiet and doesn’t sound as cool as your existing doorbell chime. I don’t understand why this is a requirement because my ring worked with it but I switched to eufy because I don’t want to pay $3 a month for something that should be free. So pick a struggle, pay $3 a month with ring or not have it work with your existing chime with eufy.If you don’t care about your chime working or not, the rest of the details are awesome! Easy to setup the app is great the quality is great the doorbell chime not working has been a whole day of headaches for me and I considered sending it back but now I’m just gonna leave it as is and be 3-star satisfied. Can’t have it all with a doorbell, I guess I should get into the business because these companies can’t get it together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Door bell and video security works as expected
reviews.reviewText: If there is existing 24v from the old door bell, then this door bell is easy to install and set up. Instructions were very clear, and permanent wiring makes it maintenance free. I like that I don’t need to pay monthly fees for web/cloud maintenance services.
Excellent doorbell, very easy to install and overall operated extremely well

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent product, no monthly subscription fees..
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product, and no monthly subscription fees. Did not fit within our current security system but will certainly consider it whenever we changed our overall protection platform. Returned the product and refunded shortly thereafter.Highly recommend and will undoubtedly buy from Eufy as an integral component of our next security platform.
Camera is clear and solid view. But it's light sensitive gave more alert in morning than afternoon. Any school bus drove by or delivery truck gave alert. Night any vehicle drive by create alert.
The bell has blue red blinking light. Doesn't get connected to the app. Not satisfied with the product

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as advertised but good door bell
reviews.reviewText: Not as advertised, data is not only stored locally but they also send it to cloud. motion detection is inaccurate (wind + tree = everything moving). only two zones. one for motion and one to exclude but exclude zone is small and fixed.If you get it on sale or really good price then it is a good option.
